metadata.title: CVE-2021-47310 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ti: fix UAF in tlan_remove_onepriv is netdev private data and it cannot beused after free_netdev() call. Using priv after free_netdev()can cause UAF bug. Fix it by moving free_netdev() at the end of thefunction.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
